title: X Factor star brutally beaten
text:
CHLOE Baker was singing for her life last week on the X Factor UK. 
Today she’s in a hospital bed with two black eyes and cuts all over her face. 
The 21-year-old from Liverpool was attacked on a night out in her home town, the Mirror reports. 
She was dragged into a car and “set upon” by somebody she says she’s known for years . She alleges her attacker — who she labelled “a monster”— tried to kidnap her before she was brutally assaulted. 
On social media, she wrote the following message to friends. 
“Wasn’t going to do this but I am because I’m truly sickened to my stomach and believe people need to know that this boy is a monster. Chloe Baker on the show. Source: Supplied The 21-year-old in hospital. Source: Facebook 
“This boy will not get away with what he’s done to me and my life.” 
A friend of Ms Baker told the Mirror her attacker “couldn’t cope with seeing her on The X Factor and became very violent. 
“Chloe was enjoying a night out with a group of her closest friends when this guy saw her and ­approached. He managed to get her into his car and she was attacked. 
“She had to go to hospital because the injuries were ­serious. She’s a lovely girl and didn’t deserve this. It’s put a real dampener on what has been a lovely ­experience for her. She’s very proud of how well she did on the show and didn’t deserve this.” 
Ms Baker narrowly missed progressing to the pointy end of the talent show last week. She was eliminated on Sunday.
